snippet.title: Super Mario Sunshine DS Trailer And Preview From SM64DS Hacks Direct
snippet.description:
This was the section I put together for the Super Mario Sunshine DS part of the Super Mario 64 DS Hacks Direct. The direct featured a TON of awesome SM64DS hacks and if you missed the direct, you should REALLY go and watch it here: https://youtu.be/P1wx81Jbhig

Hailbot's Discord: https://discord.gg/8M7s6CD
Sandbird Demo: https://youtu.be/l4qAtVck5sM
NEW Micro Demos (DESMUME ONLY AND READ THE INCLUDED READ ME FILE): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MmEiBNRdn0pbOiiThkDzQYmCOjCeMxCS/view?usp=sharing

Want to support me? Check these out!
Hailbot's Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Hailbot
Epic Games Creator Code: HAILBOT
